Full List of Themed Weekends for the Maryland Renaissance Festival This Summer! 

authored by 【29†Kristina Shriver】 | 5/6/2024

Courtesy of the Maryland Renaissance Festival (Facebook)

Share 

Ready thyself, Maryland. The Renaissance Festival is nigh!

The 【30†Maryland Renaissance Festival†rennfest.com】 is a summer staple, and it's making its grand return in 2024. The annual event will be held on the weekends from August 24 to October 20 in Annapolis, Maryland.

Whether you dress up as a 【31†fairy†amzn.to】, 【32†pirate†amzn.to】, or something in between, you're bound to have a merry time! And with each weekend having its own theme, you'll have plenty of opportunities to dress up in your best costumes! Speaking of which, that brings us to the main focus of this article: the themed weekends.

View the list of 【33†themed weekends for the 2024 Maryland Renaissance Festival†coloradorenaissance.com】 below:

## Themed Weekends for the 2024 Maryland Renaissance Festival:

  * June 15-16 - Magical Fantasy Weekend:
    * "A weekend dedicated to fantasy creatures of all ages and varieties. The magical inhabitants of the realm have come out to play. Have a dance with a fairy or a hug from a Unicorn. Join us one and all for a costume contest ... Meet with a mermaid and make merry with a living statue."
  * August 24–25 - Children's Weekend:
    * "One child aged 7 through 15 is admitted free with each adult ticket purchased. Children 6 and under are always free!"
  * September 2 - Seniors Day, Labor Day Monday:
    * "All seniors 62+ are admitted free. Seniors do not need a ticket. You may arrive and proceed directly to the gate."
  * September 7–8 - Myth & Magic Weekend:
    * "Celebrate the myths and legends of the British Isles and special magic performances!"
  * September 14–15 - Pirate Adventure Weekend:
    * "Pirate music and mayhem! Dress to impress in your piratical best!"

  * September 21–22 - Celtic Celebration:
    * "Join festival favorites and special guests as we focus on a celebration of Celtic music!"
  * September 28–29 - Shakespeare Weekend:
    * "Celebrating the Bard!"
  * October 5 - Romance Weekend: Singles Party:
    * "Singles 21+ are welcomed to attend a no-pressure Meet & Mingle near Blackfriar's Stage & the Dragon Inn from 1pm - 5pm. Please note: The Party will be cancelled if weather is not agreeable!"
  * October 6 - Romance Weekend: Renewal of Vows:
    * "Partners can renew their commitment to each other at a special Renewal of Vows ceremony at the Blackfriar's Theatre. This short (12 minutes) non-religious ceremony will be performed at 4:30pm. No reservations needed. Seating is first come, first served. This is a large group event, not a ceremony for individual couples."
  * Weekends in October - Revel Grove's Harvest Hollow:
    * "Get into the spirit of the harvest season with seasonal decorations along Mary's Dale Way and special performances for the spooky season of autumn."
  * September 7 and October 6 - ASL Interpretation:
    * "ASL Sign language interpretations at many shows. The schedule of interpreted shows will be posted online on our schedule page approximately 5 days before each ASL day.  At the festival, visit the Guest Services Pavilion for a copy of the list of these shows. Performance interpretation by SHARAVA Interpreting service."

Tickets to the Maryland Renaissance Festival can be purchased online at 【34†rennfest.com/tickets†rennfest.com】.

*This post may contain affiliate links, at no additional cost to you, and OurCommunityNow.com may earn a small commission.

【29† Kristina Shriver 】 

Associate Director of Our Community Now. When not writing or reading, Kristina likes to dance like no one is watching and enjoys speaking in vague movie references/quotes, which only a select few in her circle truly understand. A huge nerd, she loves attending comic book conventions (in costume, of course!) and engaging in geek-fueled conversations with anyone who is willing to listen to her ramble. She also dedicates her spare time to supporting various mental health organizations.

###  Thank you for your patronage and we look forward to seeing you in 2024!

##  Village Rules

Please note and observe our rules of the village:

  * Pets are NOT allowed with the exception of trained service animals.
  * No beverages in through the gates (1 personal size sealed from the manufacturer bottle of water permitted per person). Food is permitted but no coolers are permitted through gates.
  * Smoking is allowed only in Designated Smoking Areas (DSAs). All other areas are smoke free.
  * No weapons (costume or real).
  * Patrons are welcomed to wear costumes suitable for a family-friendly atmosphere to get into the spirit of the event! All performers are paid by the King's purse and scheduled by the Artistic Director. Performers will not ask for or accept tips. Patrons are not permitted to perform. Costumed patrons may not hand out candy or trinkets or approach and/or actively engage other patrons who are not part their family or friend group. Please, no posing to encourage photo ops. Thank you.

#  2024 Maryland Renaissance Festival

## 

2024 Ticket Prices and Sale Dates 

### All Dates Sold Out

(Unless tickets are submitted for approved refunds)

DO NOT CALL THE OFFICE 

* * *

Tickets cannot be swapped between days. All tickets for future weekends can be refunded until Thursday at 5:00 pm of the event weekend. If anyone requests a refund those tickets are resold through our website, but we do not have a waiting list they are first come, first served.

As ticket refund requests are being processed, those tickets are being added back into the system for resale. This makes the check mark green for available tickets.  If you see a green check but the tickets say they are sold out, that indicates that the available tickets are already in someone’s cart for checkout.  If they abandon the cart or do not complete the checkout process within the 15-minute time limit, those tickets will again become available. If the transaction is completed, then the site will show a red circle as being sold out. 

* * *

## We look forward to seeing you in Revel Grove. 

2 day Weekend tickets require a clear photo of the holder be uploaded when ordering.

If you are having trouble ordering try a different browser and/or turn off your VPN.

#  ALL TICKET SALES ARE ONLINE ONLY!

#  NO TICKETS ARE SOLD AT THE FESTIVAL GATE

### 2024 Ticket Pricing - September 14 - October 20 

##  【35†Adult (16-61) CLICK HERE FOR TICKETS†www.gatemastertickets.com】 

September 14 - October 20 - Please review terms and conditions during the purchasing process. (Ticket $29.09 + Tax $2.91) 

$ 32.00 

##  【35†Senior (62+) CLICK HERE FOR TICKETS†www.gatemastertickets.com】 

September 14 - October 20 - Please review terms and conditions during the purchasing process. (Ticket $25.45 + Tax $2.55) 

$ 28.00 

##  【35†Child (7-15) CLICK HERE FOR TICKETS†www.gatemastertickets.com】 

September 14 - October 20 - Please review terms and conditions during the purchasing process. (Ticket $16.36 + Tax $1.64) 

$ 18.00 

##  Children Under 7

And Do Not Need A Ticket 

##  Group Adult

Groups are 20 or more - Available by Phone (Beginning August 1) Monday - Friday 10:00 am - 4:00 pm. Group tickets are not available if the festival is sold out. (Ticket $25.45 + Tax $2.55) 

$ 28.00

Groups are 20 or more - Available by Phone (Beginning August 1) Monday - Friday 10:00 am - 4:00 pm. Group tickets are not available if the festival is sold out. (Ticket $15.45 + $1.55) 

$ 17.00 

##  6 Day, 9 Day and 19 Day Passes SOLD OUT

##  SOLD OUT 19 Day Pass

19 Day Passes are good for all 19 days of the 2024 Season. Personal seasonal passes are non-transferable, non-refundable and require a clear photo of the holder be uploaded when ordering. (Ticket $259.09 + Tax $25.91) 

$ 285.00 

##  SOLD OUT 9 Day Pass

9 Day Passes are good for any 9 days of the 2024 Season. Personal 9 Day passes are non-transferable, non-refundable and require a clear photo of the holder be uploaded when ordering. (Ticket $147.27 + Tax $14.73) 

$ 162.00 

##  SOLD OUT 6 Day Pass

6 Day Passes are good for any 6 days of the 2024 Season. Personal 6 Day passes are non-transferable, non-refundable and require a clear photo of the holder be uploaded when ordering. (Ticket $98.18 + Tax $9.82) 

$ 108.00 

##  【36†SOLD OUT Weekend Pass†www.gatemastertickets.com】 

Good for One Entry For Both Days Of The Selected Weekend During the 2024 Festival Season. Weekend passes are non-transferable, non-refundable and must contain the pass holders photograph. (Not available for the first three weekends.) (Ticket $49.09 + Tax $4.91) 

$ 54.00 

##  Ticket Refund Policy - Terms & Conditions

Tickets are subject to the following terms and conditions agreed to during the purchase process.

Tickets cannot be exchanged for another date.  If you are unable to attend on the selected date you must submit for a refund through the Refund Request portal below and repurchase for a new date.  If the Thursday 5:00 PM deadline has passed you are not eligible for a partial refund and your tickets will remain valid.  If you are not able to attend the tickets can be used by a family member or friend.

Only the customer who purchased tickets through our ticket system may submit for a limited refund, less convenience and processing fees, and only up to 5:00 PM Thursday before the event date printed on the ticket.  Thereafter tickets are non-refundable.  Tickets purchased after 5:00 pm Thursday for the upcoming weekend are not-refundable.  Refunds will only be issued to the original form of payment on our ticket system.

 Each ticket refund will be reduced by $5.00 for the ticket reservation, convenience and processing fees for securing and refunding the tickets.

Only single day tickets, both days of a 2 day weekend ticket or the entire group purchase of group tickets are eligible for a limited refund.  Fractions thereof are not refundable.

Annual 6-Day, 9-Day and 19-Day tickets are not eligible for refunds.

Eligible tickets can only be refunded using the 【37†Refund Request†rennapp.com】

### **STOP: TICKETS FOR 9/21/24 AND 9/22/24 ARE NO LONGER ELIGIBLE FOR A REFUND**

**No refunds requests submitted after the 5pm deadline will be processed for the upcoming weekend**

******* PLEASE BE SURE TO SPECIFY HOW MANY TICKETS YOU WISH TO REFUND FROM YOUR ORDER******

Please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to be processed and the credit to appear on your statement.  In the event the festival announces a closure before opening your tickets will be automatically refunded.

##  Festival Season

  * All tickets are subject to specific terms and conditions.
  * Single Day Admissions are Only Available online. 
  * Peak season rates applicable beginning September 14th.
  * Group rates begin at groups of 20 or more and can be purchased over the phone. Group tickets are not available if the festival is sold out. Prices listed above. 
  * Active Military Personnel with photo identification should purchase the tickets they want at the regular pricing to secure their tickets and can receive a refund between the regular price and the group price by presenting their Active-Duty Military ID at the Will Call Window for their entire purchase. Prices listed above. 
  * Buses - Easy drop off and loading with ample bus parking nearby.

##  2024 Festival Season

Online Single Day Admissions Information 

**Be sure to check your schedule and monitor the weather before purchasing your tickets

**Single Day tickets subject to specific terms and conditions and valid only for the date on the ticket.

###  Purchasing your Online Ticket

Simply enter the number of tickets you want to purchase in the appropriate category, enter your payment information, you will receive payment confirmation and ticket via email.

When you place an order, the information that you provide us is sent via a secure connection so that it cannot be read as it travels over the Internet. Once your information arrives it is carefully stored and protected against unauthorized access.

###  Printing your Online Ticket

Once you receive your Ticket via email,  you can print out the Ticket and present it at the gate or present the barcode on your phone for scanning.

Please be sure the barcode is sized properly and is clearly legible before presenting at the gate.

Don't worry! If, in the rare instance, you do not receive your email , or you are unable to print, or you forget to bring your ticket, please visit any Ticket Window to have your tickets re-issued. Be sure to bring with you your identification or your order confirmation number.

# Maryland Renaissance Festival

Hear ye! Hear ye! Leave your modern woes behind and step into 16th-century Revel Grove— the 27-acre village overseen by King Henry VIII. Beginning in August and lasting through the end of October, Lords and Ladies from faraway lands gather to experience one of Maryland's most extravagant events: 【154†The Maryland Renaissance Festival†rennfest.com】!

#### 2024 Ticket Prices and Sale Dates

Traditionally, ticket sales have begun with multi-day tickets offered the first business day after July 4th and single-day/weekend tickets the first business day after July 31. The festival returns on Saturdays and Sundays, August 24 - October 20, 2024.

PLEASE NOTE: Multi-Day tickets have SOLD OUT. Single-day ticket sales open up on August 1 at NOON.

Book early, tickets always Sell Out!

【155†TICKET SALES†rennfest.com】 

####  

#### 【156†Get Directions†www.google.com】

[Image 3: The streets at the Maryland Renaissance Festival] The streets of the Maryland Renaissance Festival. Image courtesy of 【157†Judy McGuire†rennfest.com】 from the Maryland Renaissance Festival

### The Village People

In any other setting, it may sound less than ideal to meander the woods with beggars, hermits, wenches, pickpockets, rakes, and rogues. Still, these are just some of the 200+ professional performers you'll pleasantly encounter at the 【158†Renaissance Festival】. With the Royal Court, ten performance stages, and spontaneous street acts, you may also find yourself in the presence of royalty, valiant knights, magicians, minstrels, and jesters. If you, too, want to join in the fun, dress in costume for an instant way to get in the spirit of frivolity!

[Image 4: Wreath sellers at the Maryland Renaissance Festival] Get into the festive spirit by purchasing a wreath from one of the local peddlers.  Image courtesy of 【157†Susan Carvin†rennfest.com】 from the Maryland Renaissance Festival.

You can add handcrafted details to your ensemble, like a flower crown or leather pouch, when you peruse the shops of over 140 artisans populating the grounds. If you love the thrill of action and adventure, step into the 3,000-seat arena of the King's Court for live jousting while you cheer on the Knight of your kingdom. There is sportsmanship aplenty at the festival, with demonstrations by archers, aerialists, weapons masters, and more. With plenty of opportunities to test your medieval strength.

[Image 5: A Knight on horse back at the Renaissance Festival] Be sure to step into the 3,000-seat arena of the King's Court for live jousting while you cheer on the Knight of your own kingdom.  Image courtesy of 【157†Paha Chowdhury†rennfest.com】 from the Maryland Renaissance Festival.

## Plan Your Trip

#### 【106†On The Water】

### Family-Fun Entertainment for All Ages

If you find yourself ravenous or parched after all the competition, fear not– everyone 【89†eats and drinks】 like kings in Revel Grove. Bite into a smoked turkey leg, fresh crepe, or an apple pastry from Maryland’s fall bounty. Enjoy the portable decadence of mac & cheese on a stick or a scotch egg. Wash it all down with a toast of mead or honey wine, the perfect refresher as Maryland weekends transition from warm summer into crisp fall.

With so much to see and such little time, why not make your trip to the Maryland Renaissance Festival a 【37†weekend-long adventure】? Stay in one of our many 【79†hotels】 after checking out 16th-century England and venture into 18th-century Annapolis for more 【59†family-fun things to do】.

[Image 6: man selling mead at the Renaissance Festival] If, after all the competition, you find yourself ravenous or parched, fear not– everyone 【89†eats and drinks】 like kings in Revel Grove. Image courtesy of 【157†Chellie Hyre†rennfest.com】 from the Maryland Renaissance Festival.

The Renaissance Festival has something for everyone— perfect for 【8†entertaining large groups】 and royal subjects of all ages! The festival runs on Saturdays and Sundays from August 26- October 22; for more information, visit 【154†The Maryland Renaissance Festival†rennfest.com】. We’ll s

parts:
Today's events at the Maryland Renaissance Festival for the **Celtic Celebration** weekend include a wide variety of performances, shows, and activities that run from **10:00 AM to 7:00 PM**. Highlights include:

- **Celtic music performances** by festival favorites and special guests.
- **Jousting tournaments** in the King’s Court, where knights compete in live-action battles.
- **Street performances** featuring jesters, magicians, and spontaneous acts.
- **Theatrical stage shows** across the ten performance stages, which feature a mix of comedy, drama, and historical reenactments.
- **Demonstrations** by archers, aerialists, and weapons masters.

This is just a sample of the entertainment available today. To see the full stage schedule, you can visit the official [Maryland Renaissance Festival website](https://rennfest.com/our-entertainment-schedule).

###  Thank you for your patronage and we look forward to seeing you in 2024!

##  Village Rules

Please note and observe our rules of the village:

  * Pets are NOT allowed with the exception of trained service animals.
  * No beverages in through the gates (1 personal size sealed from the manufacturer bottle of water permitted per person). Food is permitted but no coolers are permitted through gates.
  * Smoking is allowed only in Designated Smoking Areas (DSAs). All other areas are smoke free.
  * No weapons (costume or real).
  * Patrons are welcomed to wear costumes suitable for a family-friendly atmosphere to get into the spirit of the event! All performers are paid by the King's purse and scheduled by the Artistic Director. Performers will not ask for or accept tips. Patrons are not permitted to perform. Costumed patrons may not hand out candy or trinkets or approach and/or actively engage other patrons who are not part their family or friend group. Please, no posing to encourage photo ops. Thank you.

[Image 0: Maryland Renaissance Festival] 

[Image 1: Maryland Renaissance Festival]

Handicapped parking is available next to our Main Gate. When entering the parking lot, follow the signs to the designated handicapped parking area.

###  Thank you for your patronage and we look forward to seeing you in 2024!

##  Village Rules

Please note and observe our rules of the village:

  * Pets are NOT allowed with the exception of trained service animals.
  * No beverages in through the gates (1 personal size sealed from the manufacturer bottle of water permitted per person). Food is permitted but no coolers are permitted through gates.
  * Smoking is allowed only in Designated Smoking Areas (DSAs). All other areas are smoke free.
  * No weapons (costume or real).
  * Patrons are welcomed to wear costumes suitable for a family-friendly atmosphere to get into the spirit of the event! All performers are paid by the King's purse and scheduled by the Artistic Director. Performers will not ask for or accept tips. Patrons are not permitted to perform. Costumed patrons may not hand out candy or trinkets or approach and/or actively engage other patrons who are not part their family or friend group. Please, no posing to encourage photo ops. Thank you.

[Image 0: Maryland Renaissance Festival] 

[Image 1: Maryland Renaissance Festival]

Handicapped parking is available next to our Main Gate. When entering the parking lot, follow the signs to the designated handicapped parking area.
